nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model
Class Segment

java.lang.Object
  nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Segment
Direct Known Subclasses:
PairSegment, ThreadSegment
public class Segment
extends java.lang.Object

A segment of a continuous line. From straight to S-shape. Subsequent segments in a chain share their start and end point.
